cap.45: You should create five coherent captions for each video.
cap.135: The keys of this dict indicate the frame point of each segment of caption.
cap.225: Ideally, these keys (frame points) will be evenly sampled from 0th frame to the last frame (450th for example).
cap.315: This is very important as we need to align the video latent and the captions in cross attention module.
cap.405: For example, 45/135/225/315/405 is evenly spaced between 450 frames
